hero.profession: Frontend developer with experience in fullstack apps development
hero.tagline: Building interfaces that connect users and systems

about.title: About me
text: As a child, I was always interested in understanding how technology works and how most of the things we interact with every day use it, which lead me to pursue a Bachelor's degree in Systems Engineering.
Currently, I'm looking to begin my professional journey as a frontend developer, strengthening my technical skills and gaining experience by participating in impactful projects.

This portfolio is inspired by train line systems and their stations, which I find fascinating because of their logic, organization, and efficiency. These are qualities I consider fundamental in developing good software.

footer.contact: But you can check my socials, feel free to message if you want to reach out!
footer.stack: This website uses React + Vite, Tailwind CSS and i18n

warning.title: Keep off the track
warning.description: Do not trespass on the railway
